title: incompatible types even if and else uses the same code...
body:
```rust
error[E0308]: if and else have incompatible types
   --> src/main.rs:98:17
    |
87  |   /             if query["size"] != json!(-1) {
88  |   |                 Client::new()
    |  _|_________________-
89  | | |                     .post(&url)
90  | | |                     .json(&query)
91  | | |                     .send()
...   | |
95  | | |                     })
96  | | |                     .map_err(error::ErrorInternalServerError)
    | |_|_____________________________________________________________- expected because of this
97  |   |             } else {
98  | / |                 Client::new()
99  | | |                     .post(&url)
100 | | |                     .json(&query)
101 | | |                     .send()
...   | |
105 | | |                     })
106 | | |                     .map_err(error::ErrorInternalServerError)
    | |_|_____________________________________________________________^ expected closure, found a different closure
107 |   |             }
    |   |_____________- if and else have incompatible types
    |
    = note: expected type `futures::future::map_err::MapErr<futures::future::and_then::AndThen<_, futures::future::map::Map<_, [closure@src/main.rs:94:34: 94:71]>, [closure@src/main.rs:92:31: 95:22]>, _>`
               found type `futures::future::map_err::MapErr<futures::future::and_then::AndThen<_, futures::future::map::Map<_, [closure@src/main.rs:104:34: 104:71]>, [closure@src/main.rs:102:31: 105:22]>, _>`
    = note: no two closures, even if identical, have the same type
    = help: consider boxing your closure and/or using it as a trait object

error: aborting due to previous error

For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0308`.
error: Could not compile `elastic_proxy`.

To learn more, run the command again with --verbose.
```

code:
```rust
     if query["size"] != json!(-1) {
                Client::new()
                    .post(&url)
                    .json(&query)
                    .send()
                    .and_then(move |mut res| {
                        res.json::<Value>()
                            .map(|body| HttpResponse::Ok().json(&body))
                    })
                    .map_err(error::ErrorInternalServerError)
            } else {
                Client::new()
                    .post(&url)
                    .json(&query)
                    .send()
                    .and_then(move |mut res| {
                        res.json::<Value>()
                            .map(|body| HttpResponse::Ok().json(&body))
                    })
                    .map_err(error::ErrorInternalServerError)
            }
```

rustc: `rustc 1.35.0-nightly (e4c66afba 2019-04-13)`
